markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Scout's Speed](/Feats.aspx?ID=2051) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 188 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Scout](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=73)

**Prerequisites**
[Scout Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2047)

</column>

---

You move faster, especially when traveling, allowing you to scout ahead and report back without slowing your allies. You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed. When calculating your travel speed, this increases to a +20-foot status bonus.
name: Scout's Speed
